relevance_explanation: All branches that were not relevant to the customer were removed. The steps related to customer loyalty, booking information, handling of cancellation eligibility, refund processing (irrelevant because insurance wasn't purchased and the fare isn't refundable) were correctly handled.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic for this customer was preserved, including the tool calls for checking blockers, calculating cancellation fees, processing cancellation, issuing travel credit, and completing the case. All appropriate steps related to this customer's data are present.
